00075 #include <limits.h>

00086 
00087 /* register default memory-controller stats */
00088 void MC_t::reg_stats(struct stat_sdb_t * sdb)
00089 {
00090   stat_reg_counter(sdb, true, "MC.total_accesses", "total accesses to memory controller",
00091       &total_accesses, /* initial value */0, /* format */NULL);
00092   stat_reg_counter(sdb, false, "MC.total_service_cycles", "cumulative request service cycles",
00093       &total_service_cycles, /* initial value */0, /* format */NULL);
00094   stat_reg_formula(sdb, true, "MC.service_average","average cycles per MC request",
00095       "MC.total_service_cycles / MC.total_accesses",/* format */NULL);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void MC_t::init(void)
00099 {
00100   total_accesses = 0;
00101   total_dram_cycles = 0;
00102   total_service_cycles = 0;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void MC_t::reset_stats(void)
00106 {
00107   total_accesses = 0;
00108   total_dram_cycles = 0;
00109   total_service_cycles = 0;
00110 }

00112 #define MC_ENQUEUABLE_HEADER \
00113   bool enqueuable(void)
00114 #define MC_ENQUEUE_HEADER \
00115   void enqueue(struct cache_t * const prev_cp,  \
00116                const enum cache_command cmd,  \
00117                const md_paddr_t addr,  \
00118                const int linesize,  \
00119                const seq_t action_id,  \
00120                const int MSHR_bank,  \
00121                const int MSHR_index,  \
00122                void * const op,  \
00123                void (*const cb)(void *),  \
00124                seq_t (*const get_action_id)(void *) )
00125 #define MC_STEP_HEADER \
00126   void step(void)
00127 #define MC_REG_STATS_HEADER \
00128   void reg_stats(struct stat_sdb_t * const sdb)
00129 #define MC_RESET_STATS_HEADER \
00130   void reset_stats(void)
00131 #define MC_PRINT_HEADER \
00132   void print(FILE * const fp)

00134 #include "ZCOMPS-MC.list"
00135 
00136 MC_t * MC_from_string(char * const opt_string)
00137 {
00138   char type[256];
00139 
00140   /* the format string "%[^:]" for scanf reads a string consisting of non-':' characters */
00141   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%[^:]",type) != 1)
00142     fatal("malformed dram option string: %s",opt_string);
00143 
00144   /* include the argument parsing code.  MC_PARSE_ARGS is defined to
00145      include only the parsing code and not the other dram code. */
00146 #define MC_PARSE_ARGS
00147 #include "ZCOMPS-MC.list"
00148 #undef MC_PARSE_ARGS
00149 
00150   /* UNKNOWN Memory-Controller Type */
00151   fatal("Unknown memory-controller type (%s)",opt_string);
00152 }
